params.name: baseGas
params.description: Gas costs for data used to trigger the safe transaction.

params.name: gasPrice

functions.source:
function getTransactionHash(
        address to, 
        uint256 value, 
        bytes memory data, 
        Enum.Operation operation, 
        uint256 safeTxGas, 
        uint256 baseGas, 
        uint256 gasPrice,
        address gasToken,
        address refundReceiver,
        uint256 _nonce
    )
        public
        view
        returns (bytes32)
    {
        return keccak256(encodeTransactionData(to, value, data, operation, safeTxGas, baseGas, gasPrice, gasToken, refundReceiver, _nonce));
    }

params.name: safeTxGas
params.description: Fas that should be used for the safe transaction.

params.name: baseGas
params.description: Gas costs for data used to trigger the safe transaction.

params.name: gasPrice

functions.source:
function getTransactionHash(
        address to, 
        uint256 value, 
        bytes memory data, 
        Enum.Operation operation, 
        uint256 safeTxGas, 
        uint256 baseGas, 
        uint256 gasPrice,
        address gasToken,
        address refundReceiver,
        uint256 _nonce
    )
        public
        view
        returns (bytes32)
    {
        return keccak256(encodeTransactionData(to, value, data, operation, safeTxGas, baseGas, gasPrice, gasToken, refundReceiver, _nonce));
    }

functions.name: getTransactionHash

params.name: safeTxGas
params.description: Fas that should be used for the safe transaction.

params.name: baseGas
params.description: Gas costs for data used to trigger the safe transaction.

params.name: gasPrice
params.description: Maximum gas price that should be used for this transaction.

params.name: refundReceiver
params.description: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).

functions.source:
function getTransactionHash(
        address to, 
        uint256 value, 
        bytes memory data, 
        Enum.Operation operation, 
        uint256 safeTxGas, 
        uint256 baseGas, 
        uint256 gasPrice,
        address gasToken,
        address refundReceiver,
        uint256 _nonce
    )
        public
        view
        returns (bytes32)
    {
        return keccak256(encodeTransactionData(to, value, data, operation, safeTxGas, baseGas, gasPrice, gasToken, refundReceiver, _nonce));
    }
